name: shmong-face-register
description: Face registration Lambda function for Shmong app

scripts.dev:clean-win: powershell -Command "taskkill /F /IM node.exe; npm cache clean --force; Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .vite*; Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue node_modules\.vite; npm run dev"
scripts.dev:clean: killall node || true && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf .vite* node_modules/.vite && npm run dev
scripts.build:clean-win: powershell -Command "npm cache clean --force; Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .vite*; Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue node_modules\.vite; npm run build"
scripts.build:clean: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf .vite* node_modules/.vite && npm run build
scripts.s3-sync:cache: npm run s3-sync:html && npm run s3-sync:assets
scripts.s3-sync:html: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://shmong --delete --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --cache-control "public, max-age=0, must-revalidate" --content-type "text/html; charset=utf-8"
scripts.s3-sync:assets: aws s3 sync dist/assets/ s3://shmong/assets --delete --cache-control "public, max-age=31536000, immutable"
scripts.s3-sync:win: powershell -Command "aws s3 sync dist/ s3://shmong --delete --exclude '*' --include '*.html' --cache-control 'public, max-age=0, must-revalidate' --content-type 'text/html; charset=utf-8' && aws s3 sync dist/assets/ s3://shmong/assets --delete --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run s3-sync && npm run invalidate-cf
scripts.deploy:cache: npm run build && npm run s3-sync:cache && npm run invalidate-cf
scripts.deploy:win: powershell -Command "npm cache clean --force; Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .vite*; npm run build && npm run s3-sync:win && npm run invalidate-cf"
scripts.release: npm version patch && npm run deploy:cache
